title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.6 - Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 187.6 - Appeals

State Regulations
(a) Appeals shall
be directed to the commissioner on forms prescribed by him, copies of which are
available at the offices of the records access officer and of the person in
charge of each office located outside the City of Albany. (b) All such appeals shall be delivered to
the records access officer, or to the person in charge of an office outside the

City of Albany, within 30 days after the denial from which such appeal is
taken. (c) Appeals will be
determined by the commissioner or his authorized representative. (d) Notice of a determination denying an
appeal by a data subject relating to the amendment of or the correction of a
department record shall include notice to the data subject of the right to file
a statement of disagreement with the disputed record, as provided in Public

Officers Law, section 95(4). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
187.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
